title: Toxic Girl
description: Everyone has secrets.Finally, I had a fresh start. I knew no one.I could be anyone, or so I thought.I wanted to be invisible, to blend into the background. But it turned out keeping my secret wasnâ€™t as easy as I thought it would be.Enter Grayson Mills.When Grayson noticed me, so did everyone else.He wanted me. Bad.And what Grayson wanted, he usually got.
author: Chantal Fernando
